name: Deep Blue (itch) (willsalame)
description:
Story

Every spot your gaze stumble upon shines back a vidid blue light. You're lost, surrounded by an unfamiliar sea with no land on sight. Faint memories about the past come flooding your brain. But you realize it has always been just you, wandering alone searching for someone else. You're brought back to reality at the sight of a floating crate containing something that looks a like a rugged notebook. Armed with this new hope, you embark on a journey through dangerous seas in order to find its mysterious author.

Gameplay

Explore the world of Deep Blue on your ship in this top down adventure.
Fish resources and enhance your boat to cross dangerous obstacles on your way
Uncover the past of this mysterious world by completing your notebook and retrace the steps of his author.
